messages.subject: Re: I think I figured it out
messages.msgSnippet: ... live lives ... I like it! And not just because it reminds me of if you want to make a cake, you have to break a few eggs !  --aj
messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, SandraDodd@a... wrote:
> Maybe.
> Until I figure out a better AHA! crux-of-the-matter, this might be
it:
>
>
> If homeschoolers want to live without a curriculum, they need to
live lives
> in which a curriculum isn't necessary.

I like it! And not just because it reminds me of "if you want to make
a cake, you have to break a few eggs"! <g>

--aj

messages.subject: I think I figured it out
messages.msgSnippet: Maybe. Until I figure out a better AHA! crux-of-the-matter, this might be  it: If homeschoolers want to live without a curriculum, they need to live lives in
messages.messageBody:
Maybe.
Until I figure out a better AHA! crux-of-the-matter, this might be it:


If homeschoolers want to live without a curriculum, they need to live lives
in which a curriculum isn't necessary.



Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
